example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS قال) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP شديد)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC اثر) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اللقاء))) (S (PUNC ") (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P سعدنا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لقاء) (NP (NOUN_PROP+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN فخامة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الرئيس)))))))

arg.g: Show romanization Pleased to meet with His Excellency President
